title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V2\ListRecognizersRequest
name: ListRecognizersRequest
description:
Request message for the [ListRecognizers][google.cloud.speech.v2.Speech.ListRecognizers] method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v2.ListRecognizersRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The project and location of Recognizers to list. The expected format is projects/{project}/locations/{location}.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: The maximum number of Recognizers to return. The service may return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 20 Recognizers will be returned. The maximum value is 20; values above 20 will be coerced to 20.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: A page token, received from a previous [ListRecognizers][google.cloud.speech.v2.Speech.ListRecognizers] call. Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page. When paginating, all other parameters provided to [ListRecognizers][google.cloud.speech.v2.Speech.ListRecognizers] must match the call that provided the page token.

params.name: data.show_deleted
params.description: Whether, or not, to show resources that have been deleted.
